Main Tools¶

Train¶

tools.train.main(config_path: pathlib.Path, dataset_path: pathlib.Path) → Union[Tuple[pathlib.Path], pathlib.Path][source]¶

Main function responsible for training classification model.

Parameters

  • config_path¶ (Path) – Path to main config (of DefaultConfig class)

  • dataset_path¶ (Path) – Path to dataset

Returns

Tuple containing path to the experiment root dirrectory and path to the saved model directory.

Predict¶

tools.predict.main(config_path: pathlib.Path, input_path: pathlib.Path, model_path: pathlib.Path, predict_path: pathlib.Path) → pathlib.Path[source]¶

Main function responsible for prediction with passed model.

Parameters

  • config_path¶ (Path) – Path to main config (of DefaultConfig class)

  • input_path¶ (Path) – Path to file with input data

  • model_path¶ (Path) – Path to trained model

  • predict_path¶ (Path) – Path to output directory

Returns

Path to the experiment root dir.

Evaluate¶

tools.evaluate.main(config_path: pathlib.Path, data_path: pathlib.Path, input_path: pathlib.Path, predict_path: pathlib.Path, evaluate_path: pathlib.Path) → pathlib.Path[source]¶

Main function responsible for evaluation with passed model.

Parameters

  • config_path¶ (Path) – Path to main config (of DefaultConfig class)

  • data_path¶ (Path) – Path to file containing data

  • input_path¶ (Path) – Path to file with input data

  • predict_path¶ (Path) – Path to file with model predictions

  • output_path¶ (Path) – Path to output directory

Returns

Path to the experiment root dir.

Pipelines¶

Train + Predict + Evaluate¶

tools.pipeline.main(config_path: pathlib.Path, dataset_path: pathlib.Path, data_path: pathlib.Path, predict_path: pathlib.Path, input_path: pathlib.Path, evaluate_path: Optional[pathlib.Path] = None) → None[source]¶

Main function responsible for prediction with passed model.

Parameters

  • config_path¶ (Path) – Path to main config (of DefaultConfig class)

  • dataset_path¶ (Path) – Path to dataset

  • data_path¶ (Path) – Path to file containing data

  • predict_path¶ (Path) – Path to file with model predictions

  • input_path¶ (Path) – Path to file with input data

  • evaluate_path¶ (Path) – Path to evaluations

Additional tools¶

Compare experiment plots¶

tools.compare_plots.main(root_path: pathlib.Path, output_path: pathlib.Path, experiments: str, supported_files: str, prefix: str) → None[source]¶

Function responsible for saving plots containing info about metric values in every experiment.

Parameters

  • root_path¶ (Path) – Path to the root folder for the subprocess

  • output_path¶ (Path) – Path to output directory

  • experiments¶ (str) – Relative paths to experiments separated by a coma

  • supported_files¶ (str) – Names of files necessary for tool usage

  • prefix¶ (str) – Prefix for data taken into account
